ðŸ“– Summary: The Telegram Media Downloader is a tool for downloading media files (up to 2GiB per file) from Telegram conversations, chats, and channels, even from private groups with download restrictions. It supports both a web UI for browsing and downloading, and a Telegram bot interface for issuing download commands.
